articles.author: Kevin Scarbinsky | Special to AL.com
articles.title: Scarbinsky: When they least expect it, expect Alabama to beat Indiana in the Rose Bowl - AL.com
articles.description: If all those people that study the sport so closely think so highly of the Hoosiers, who in their right mind would believe that Kalen DeBoer and three-loss Alabama have a real shot to win the Rose Bowl today?
articles.content:
This is an opinion column.
Fernando Mendoza might be the best player in college football this season. The Heisman Trophy voters think so.
Curt Cignetti might be the best coach in college football r… [+4124 chars]
